SQL.LOAD: SELECT code, description, rule_type_id, rule_category_id, rule_execution_point, rule_data_set, effective, expiration, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, rule_id FROM elp_rule WHERE rule_id = :rule_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT rule_id, nvl(description,'Unknown Description') as description FROM elp_rule WHERE rule_id = :rule_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_rule SET code = :code, description = :description, rule_type_id = :rule_type_id, rule_category_id = :rule_category_id, rule_execution_point = :rule_execution_point, rule_data_set = :rule_data_set, effective = :effective, expiration = :expiration, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE rule_id = :rule_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_rule ( code, description, rule_type_id, rule_category_id, rule_execution_point, rule_data_set, effective, expiration, created_by, rule_id ) VALUES ( :code, :description, :rule_type_id, :rule_category_id, :rule_execution_point, :rule_data_set, :effective, :expiration, :created_by, :rule_id )
SQL.LOAD_SEARCH_LIST: SELECT RULE_ID,ER.CODE,ER.DESCRIPTION, GETDESCRIPTIONFROMLISTITEM(RULE_TYPE_ID,L.LANGUAGE_ID) RULE_TYPE, GETDESCRIPTIONFROMLISTITEM(RULE_CATEGORY_ID,L.LANGUAGE_ID) RULE_CATEGORY, EFFECTIVE, EXPIRATION FROM ELP_RULE ER, ELP_LANGUAGE L WHERE ER.CODE LIKE :CODE AND ER.DESCRIPTION LIKE :DESCRIPTION AND L.LANGUAGE_ID = :LANG_ID
SQL.IsIssueAssignedtoRule: SELECT ISSUE_ID FROM ELP_RULE_ISSUE WHERE ISSUE_ID = :issue_id
SQL.LOAD_RULES_BY_DEALER_AND_COMPANY: (SELECT er.rule_id,er.code,er.description FROM ELP_RULE er inner join Elp_Rule_List_Detail erld on erld.rule_id = er.rule_id inner join elp_dealer_rule_list edrl on edrl.rule_list_id = erld.rule_list_id inner join elp_rule_list erl on edrl.rule_list_id = erl.rule_list_id and sysdate BETWEEN er.effective AND er.expiration and sysdate BETWEEN erld.effective AND erld.expiration and sysdate BETWEEN edrl.effective AND edrl.expiration and sysdate BETWEEN erl.effective AND erl.expiration and edrl.dealer_id = :dealer_id ) union ( SELECT er.rule_id,er.code,er.description FROM ELP_RULE er inner join Elp_Rule_List_Detail erld on erld.rule_id = er.rule_id inner join elp_company_rule_list ecrl on ecrl.rule_list_id = erld.rule_list_id inner join elp_rule_list erl on ecrl.rule_list_id = erl.rule_list_id and sysdate BETWEEN er.effective AND er.expiration and sysdate BETWEEN erld.effective AND erld.expiration and sysdate BETWEEN ecrl.effective AND ecrl.expiration and sysdate BETWEEN erl.effective AND erl.expiration and ecrl.company_id = :company_id)
